profile:
Aire One was established in the late 1980's by a group of professionals with experience in the Heating & Cooling business and has since grown to become one of the leaders in the residential HVAC industry. 

All our technicians (over 30 gas techs work for Aire One in the tri-city area) are gas authority certified and are qualified refrigeration techs. Due to exceptional quality and professional service, Aire One has been growing at an unprecedented rate.

Public Recognition:

Aire One has won several awards from recognized leaders of the industry for their achievements and exceptional loyal and dedicated customer service such as Lennox Customer Service Awards, York growth Awards and many more.

Technical Team:

Experienced, Bonded, Factory trained and licensed technical specialists will install and service your equipment with an incomparable professionalism. Our 24-hour emergency service with electronically dispatched technicians are available to respond quickly to our customer’s needs.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile: Whether you need a new furnace or a new air conditioning unit for your home or your business, we are available to handle all of your heating, cooling and ventilation needs.  We continually strive to exceed expectations by ensuring that each  client receives the very best service. We will work with you to find HVAC solutions that fit your healthy indoor air quality needs. We will provide you with a full consultation to explain all of your available options so that you can choose the system that’s right for your home or business. We service all your HVAC systems and offer a variety of money-saving solutions. We combine our use of the highest quality parts and equipment, and our dedication to delivering  exceptional service to provide you with top quality service.

profile:
At Cross Heating & Air Conditioning Ltd., your comfort is our priority.
We use a technological approach that ensures our customers have the best heating, cooling, and air quality solutions for their homes.
With locations in Listowel, Hanover and Waterloo, Cross Heating and Air Conditioning Ltd. is there when you need us.  We sell and service a wide range of furnaces, central air conditioners, heat pumps, in-floor heating systems, boilers, water heaters, water softeners, and geothermal systems. We also offer protection plans and maintenance plans for heating and/or cooling systems.
